context.p: This procedure provides instructions on how to configure OpenStack environment for an OpenStack project that requires the OpenStack RC file.

note.p: For consistency Nokia recommends to place your Keystone information in /opt/sps/configs.

step.cmd: In OpenStack dashboard, click the Project tab, select the project for which you are going to download the OpenStack RC file. Click the Access & Security button.
Click the API Access tab, then click the Download OpenStack RC File button and then save the OpenStack RC file.

note.p: The file name has the following notation: <PROJECT>-openrc.sh, where <PROJECT> is the project name for which you have downloaded the OpenStack RC file.

step.cmd: If you are unable to download the OpenStack RC file, perform the procedure .
Copy the <PROJECT>-openrc.sh file to the Maestro VM from which you are going to run OpenStack commands.

note.p: You might copy the <PROJECT>-openrc.sh file to the computer from which you are going to upload the image with a glance client command.
